attributes.action: Dual the A90 Road From Ellon to Peterhead & Fraserburgh Aberdeenshire, Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
The following Vehicles is causing slow & unnecessary delays 

Mainly Heavy Industrial Lorries going to Peterhead.  Dales Indutrial Estate, Asco , Crane Lorries going to Peterhead Harbour,  Recycling Trucks
attributes.background: Lorries, Tractors and other heavy Vehicles causing build up of slow traffic during normal working hours, taking you longer to make journeys compared to the dualled roads, peaked times are causing traffic delays at Ellon Junction to Peterhead turn off

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

Transport Scotland maintains, upgrades and monitors the trunk road network across Scotland, including dualling roads. You can find out more here:
https://www.transport.gov.scot/transport-network/roads/
https://www.transport.gov.scot/projects/a9-dualling-perth-to-inverness/

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
